node.title: Monitor Disaster or Emergency using RSOE Website
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
There are so many natural disasters or emergency situation is prevailing all over the world be it any part of the world. Every day we see there are so many people are dying because of Hurricanes Harvey, Irma, Floor or even Earthquakes. So just think how to know that there might be some emergency in certain location, this is where RSOE (National Association of Radio Distress-Signalling and Infocommunications) comes into picture. 

According to their [website](http://hisz.rsoe.hu/alertmap/database/?pageid=about_us), 

>The National Association of Radio Distress-Signalling and Infocommunications (RSOE) operates Emergency and Disaster Information Service (EDIS) within the frame of his own web site which has the objective to monitor and document all the events on Earth which may cause disaster or emergency. The main objective is to manage information about events endangering the safety of our own country. Our service is using the speed and the data spectrum of the internet to gather information. We are monitoring and processing several foreign organization’s data to get quick and certified information. This data will be continuously published on our Internet web site. Beside the official information, with the help of special programs nearly 1500-2000 internet press publication will be monitored and the publication containing predefined keywords will be processed. However, these „news” cannot be considered as official and reliable information, but many times we have learnt critical information from the internet press.

The events captured by them are : Seismically activities, Tsunami events, Nuclear power plant status (only USA), Wild animals in danger of biological (only USA), Severe weather events (hailstorm, tornadoes and dangerous winds) in USA, Forest fire events (mostly in US) and Geomagnetic Storm Alert. 

They do have operators all around the world which give information about the events like Acid rain, Cold wave, Fires, Floods, Storm, Tsunami and tidal wave etc.

Now if I talk about India as of 12th Sep, 11:00 AM IST, I can see that there was a Vehicle Accident happened yesterday.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZFhKRWvmbrn5caAap1vM1jbtUUEPFsEFi2eEj3Pwo3o2/image.png)

The event report is spontaneous, as you can see there was a Biological Hazard in Ontario, Canada just when I was writing this post.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmeVvUc79ZgPE6BgMsymKXfRvErSaJ1tsnuAwpdtYrGuHh/image.png)

The whole world map looks like below where you can see any place affected at that time.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZPiEqNBnWBYd9gZkA2NfCcb2UyQaozTvwW3SGwAB52M1/image.png)

The website is http://hisz.rsoe.hu/alertmap/index2.php. All the images are the screenshots of the website.  So next time if you are travelling to any place just look into the website and be safe.

node.title: Don't Use mobile phones while driving
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
How many times have we seen this hoarding, that do not use mobile phones while driving? But who cares, is life so cheap now a days. 

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmT3VfVrsfSBictmTGzrnE879HkPZhZLF5ND1DR6LaeGS2/image.png)
PC : [safety.af.mil](http://www.safety.af.mil/News/Article-Display/Article/434375/confessions-of-a-text-offender/)

You know in India, in the recent data released by transport ministry has claimed that more than 2000 people died because of using mobile phones while driving. 

People use their mobile phones while driving, not only for talking but also for taking crazy selfies.

I would suggest everyone that you should not use mobile phones while driving because your life is precious. It is a big risk, do not take it for yourself as well as for your loved ones.

node.title: My Weekend Trip to Coorg - The Scotland of India
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
### Coorg - The Scotland of India
###
The land of Kodagu (also known as Coorg) with its beautiful hills, streams, dense forests, vegetation and fauna and river Kaveri became a lot more attractive to the tourist. A lot of people spend their weekends in Coorg and it is the best weekend gataway from Bangalore.

Coorg is called as a Scotland of India because most of the planters were Scots and the similarities between both the places earned Coorg the nickname of "Scotland Of India". Just Like Scotmandm, Coorg is also mountainous and misty along with the temperature which is normally cool.

Both Coorg and Scotland has cultural similarities as well, like both of them had clan based societies. Both the clans of Scouts and Coorg keep arms, the Scots kept short daggers whereas the Coorgs kept carved daggers.

I have visited many places in Coorg over this weekend and wanted to show you how beautiful Coorg is :) All the pictures were clicked by Nokia 6, Mobile Camera

<hr>

### Coffee Plantation in Brahmagiri Hills
###

Coffee is cultivated extensively in Coorg.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbQ4yTsQJ2peQ8DK7eDKZNdig3FaTVvW7meehbLdZYSoh/image.png)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbDJQSDfdLJqHJdv23UTm7XA8QUdzDuXQ3vM3SeQfUDxZ/image.png)

<hr>

### View from Raja's Seat
###

Raja's Seat is famous for its scenic beauty, the name is because you will feel like King sitting on top of the world.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPUffgrYfYKkEaRf5EkYbMxYinJFPN41EFNc3TTjesw73/image.png)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRC1hH1hwHzZjSn7cr2U5tJYYKvAetYVERuMu4aBcDFru/image.png)

### Monks in Golden Temple, Kushalnagar
###

When Tibetan monks came to India they have created their small peaceful society out here in Coorg.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTQS1Lz5nc4ePYwJs7TbBCgNAShRxcwqBjPxbz7x5GrQL/image.png)

<hr>

### View of Golden Temple
###

Awesome looking temple.

![IMG_20170910_115755.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSVdEe5cr4wweKJTW6HvNpBLXTNGyGT6WuWtgUKCrWf1B/IMG_20170910_115755.jpg)

<hr>

### TalaCavery - The Birth Place of River Cauvery
###

The sacred river of Cavery starts from TalaCavery and it is transformed as a temple.

![IMG_20170909_140501.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRRjqs4Rb4SiXEBod82WeFmcMz52jFQvm7jCPh4ejHaeG/IMG_20170909_140501.jpg)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPHTHUcy5ANfU8V3emMPqN33pFzNFnyBhPYPkj2LyeFKZ/image.png)

<hr>

### Abbey Falls
###

One of the best places to visit in Coorg, you will feel like staying there a whole day.

![IMG_20170909_094849~2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmW8TQbM4FL1FTpLfyctnUbCgeit3iSgVzpgGMa4bbtBDK/IMG_20170909_094849~2.jpg)

<hr>

### <center> Follow @codingdefined </center>

node.title: Every Photo Adds Value To Steemit, Giving Out 50 SBD Weekly To Stimulate Photography!
node.author: juliank
node.body:
<center>

# 7 different weekly top 10 photography categories

***
![20.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSH1YUPoagEHoDWcMPNjcfgP1h7Ku2jv4VastQyfiq1iP/20.jpg)
travelphotography 
Green Cave
Vis - Croatia
***
# Every photograph increases the value of the Steemit blockchain
I want to stimulate the amount of photography on Steemit and reward the users for doing so. Every post on Steemit adds value to the platform. By correctly tagging every photograph and providing the correct context for each post on Steemit users will be better able to find the photographs. User may come from search engines like google search or using a future Steemit search engine. In essence creating a huge photography library on the Steemit blockchain. Creating both current and future value as posts made on the Steemit blockchain are forever. 

# How to participate
Share your photography with the relevant category hashtag and let everybody know where the photo was taken and/or what is displayed.

# Current categories + prize pools

Monday: **[foodphotography](https://steemit.com/trending/foodphotography)** 5 SBD
Tuesday: **[landscapephotography](https://steemit.com/trending/landscapephotography)** 5 SBD
Wednesday: **[architecturalphotography](https://steemit.com/trending/architecturalphotography)** 5 SBD
Thursday: **[macrophotography](https://steemit.com/trending/macrophotography)** 5 SBD
Friday: **[streetphotography](https://steemit.com/trending/streetphotography)** 5 SBD
Saturday: **[sportsphotography](https://steemit.com/trending/sportsphotography)** 5 SBD
Sunday: **[goldenhourphotography](https://steemit.com/trending/goldenhourphotography)** 20 SBD

# Payout
Every 7 days I will look through all the posts from the last 7 days and pick out my top 10 favourites. Each winner will receive 10% of the prize pool for that category. Each participant can win only once per category, but can win in multiple categories. Deadlines are at 23:59 UTC.

Depending on the how every category goes the weekly prize pools can be increased or decreased.

***
![4.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZBgzjKT1u62mpwF7UhXwdCoKn8uxgN14F9sFkK5yp4Yj/4.jpg)
streetphotography
Beijing - China
***
# Important note
All first deadlines except Saturday and Sunday get 7 days added.
***
![follow](https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/DQmWpisRXDF56mV3DgzzPUxb3R2ozseR48YVr2YKtwtrBcV/upvotefollowresteem.gif)

</center>

node.title: Healthy Food for Healthy Mind
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
My question out here is for everyone, have you eaten Healthy Food today. You might have heard about the good all saying "you are what you eat" which means whatever you consume determines the nutrients you are consuming and the impact it will have on your mind.

I am not here for giving my lecture on Healthy food, what should you eat and what not. That's none of my business, but I would simply request you to have one healthy meal once a week.  As I am having it today

![IMG_20170906_165851.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUmTW3uGL5E8bxg7NB8EEYqvktsJnPuMaG3y4px3oVqTM/IMG_20170906_165851.jpg)

![IMG_20170906_165833.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRtaFda1DhUTRX5ND4c8LJTF3n3h9Td7SmY4ARnxqHSR8/IMG_20170906_165833.jpg)

<hr>

## <center> Follow @codingdefined </center>

node.title: Habits that leads to Depression and how to come out of it
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
If you ever felt hopelessness( felt like there is no hope for anything happening good) then you have experienced the ill effects of depression. It is appropriate for me too say that depression is like an illness where it takes all the energy and pleasure out from you. There are many thing that can lead you to depression. 

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmegGgkgVMhYJVtXEgofZ8a9PAWyDGgM45TausQHLymQqB/image.png)
PC : [Pixabay](https://pixabay.com/p-242024/?no_redirect![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXTyRmk85Sc7vvfpkCjBLodneGJN8Hhgdekz3Ycv1BDX6/image.png))

In this post we will figure out what are the main habits that leads you to depression.
<hr>

**1 : Lack of Exercise -** Do you aware of how much important is exercise for our body, not only physical but also for your mental health. Have you ever gone for a walk in the evening or in the morning, there is so much energy outside that will make you feel alive. Staying in home all day and not doing any physical activity can lead to depression. 

You will become lazy and become oversize which again can lead to depression becuase it will reduce the confidence you have in yourself. 

**To come out of depression -** The simple remedy of coming out of depression is to start exercise. I am not telling you to go and hit the gym and become a bodybuilder. But a casual walk in the morning or evening can make a monumental difference if you are suffering from depression.

<hr>

**2 : Sleeping Habits -** If you have a poor sleeping habits then that situation is ideal for depression. It is necessary for human body to get atleast 7 hours sleep daily. That does not mean that you should sleep anytime and make that 7 hours, you should have a proper sleeping routine. Lack of sleep will make you agitated thus eventually leads you to depression. Again if you are stressed you will not get the sleep you want.

**To come out of depression -** Sleep at least 7-8 hours daily with proper routine like 10 PM sleep and 6 AM wakeup. If you take enough rest your mind is always clear and then it helps you to reduce the stress as well.

<hr>

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmS6Lqdj4XuDRrQbofbNdaUhN5wyarnYUz8ZS8ckbfycCE/image.png)
PC : [Pixabay](https://pixabay.com/p-689453/?no_redirect)

**3 : Isolation State -** Keeping oneself in Isolation is one more habit of getting depressed. When you start avoiding friends and family, then you are getting into a situation which is ideal for depression. It is worst thing for an individual to be alone or to be isolated.

**To come out of depression -** Talk to friends and families atleat once a day. Talk about all the positive thing happen in a day, it is always important to be connected with other people no matter whatever situation you are in.

<hr>

**4 : Dont' think too much -** Negative thinking about anything is the major cause of depression. It is like a cancer to keep thinking about whatever has happened. See, you cannot change anything whatever has happened but by over-thinking about that you are doing more damage to yourself. These things are out of your control and by just thinking you cannot change it and eventually it will make you depressed. 

**To come out of depression -** Always try to redirect your attention to more positive things in your life than the things you cannot change. If you cannot ignore the fact, then what you should write whatever you have in mind and flush it. It will make you feel better.

<hr>
